subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_022D_01C9E847.78E1B630
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

So everything can be defined as from one of these forces. Objects from thes=
e forces can omit sound waves.

Does that sound like a correct statement? J=
ust trying to get my mind around it.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 2:33 PM=

  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas





        April, standard physics to=
day defines four fundamental types of forces: electromagnetism, gravity,  a=
nd the strong and weak interaction of elementary particles.  So while EM is=
 one type of energy (well, lets call it a force), there are a few others to=
o.


        --- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostr=
esearch.com> wrote:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieg=
hostresearch.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
          To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:21 PM



  =
        This seems to jive with what I have learned this far, but I am stil=
l not certain I understand it completely.

          I thought everything w=
as based in the electromagnetic spectrum.

          ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
            From: Frank Ratka 
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups =
.com 
            Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 2:05 PM
            Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


                  Tell me where the seperation on=
 the spectrum takes place between 300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, soundwaves cause p=
ressure waves that our ears read as vibration and our mind translates as so=
und. The waves are still on the electromagnetic spectrum. Even subsonic geo=
magnetic waves are present on the scale. What I mean by power can be direct=
ll translated to volume or amplitude. The only thing that distinguishes sou=
ndwaves from any other wave is the fact that we can hear them.

           =
       Frank R.

                  --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. =
com> wrote:


                    From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com>
          =
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                    To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups .com
                    Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:53 PM


=
                          No. Sounds waves are not on the electromagnet spe=
ctrum nor are they a form of electromagnet energy. Sound waves are based on=
 pressure waves in the air (or in other substances).  Our ears detect these=
 pressure waves and translate them into sounds we here.  Our ear do NOT hea=
r electromagnet energy.  Our eyes do: that part which we call visible light=
.



                          --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18ei=
i@ yahoo.com> wrote:


                            From: Frank Ratka <warri=
or18eii@ yahoo.com>
                            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New =
ideas
                            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
            =
                Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:38 PM


                    =
            It sounds like she's saying "one, two, ....."

                =
                A mistake that a lot of people make is thinking that there =
are two different types of energy at work when it comes to sound waves and =
electromagnetic waves. The only thing that seperates them is frequency and =
power. Radio waves are radio waves because they occupy a certain block of t=
he electromagnietic spectrum. Sound waves exist on that same spectrum just =
farther down with much longer waves. Soundwaves and subsonic waves can pene=
trate almost anything because of their wavelengths. The shorter the wavelen=
gth the more ways we can shield against them.

                            =
    Think of microwaves. These are also a type of radio and telemetry trans=
mitting wave but the waves also have a physical effect on our environment b=
y causing molecules to speed up, which creates heat. A little lower than th=
is is IR or infrared it too can cause physical objects to heat up but usual=
ly it just causes molecules to rotate in place. All physical things give of=
f IR light. Its a way the total system conserves energy by spontaneously em=
itting IR radiation.

                                Frank R.

           =
                     --- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercromb=
iegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


                                From: April=
 Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
                       =
         Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas [3 Attachments]
                 =
               To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                               =
 Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:27 PM


                                Here=
 is some food for thought. I am currently reviewing my audio from our May 3=
0th investigation.

                                It was me and another g=
irl teammate present in the room. I picked up a 3rd female voice on my digi=
tal voice recorder that I carry with me. We were standing right next to ano=
ther digital video recorder that I leave beside my night vision camera. Tha=
t recorder did not pick up this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that was w=
ith me to check her recording to see if she picked it up.

                =
                I have long felt the true EVP does not come from sound wave=
s in the environment, or then it wouldn't be EVP, but a disembodied voice. =
Somehow EVP's are appearing directly on the recordings.

                  =
              This instance with the recorders may back that theory up. Tha=
t other recorder should have picked that voice up if it were sound waves in=
 the environment.

                                I am attaching the clip =
of this 3rd voice. The file that is named "01-02-17 Clip" is the full clip.=
 You will hear my voice as I say "Yeah", and then another comes in right af=
ter that. I think I know what it says.

                                Aga=
in, I was live monitoring my audio, but still did not hear this until playb=
ack. It isn't clear, so I am not as excited about it as my one's from the l=
ast investigation.


                                ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                                From: Frank Ratka 
                =
                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                             =
   Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
                                Subj=
ect: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


                                I have a run=
ning theory that EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exact=
ly where they want it to manifest. It works off the heterodyne principle. I=
f you mix two ultrasonic waves that differ one another in frequency then if=
 you add or subtract them together you get a beat frequency or alternate fr=
equency. For example, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz and you have =
an electric fan in a room creating an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then yo=
u will have a intermediate difference frequency at 9KHz, well within human =
hearing range (20Hz to 20KHz). This was just an example, but all electronic=
 equipment generates ultrasonic signals just by turning them on. From this =
theory I always felt that EVP were generated within a few inches of the rec=
order.

                                We are able to reproduce this affec=
t in not only radio with superheterodyne systems but also with acoustics an=
d audio as in some passive sonars and a commercial produce called the "audi=
o spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.

                                Frank =
R.

                                --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.za=
ck@gmail. com> wrote:


                                From: Zack Widup <w=
9sz.zack@gmail. com>
                                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]=
 New ideas
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
   =
                             Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM


        =
                        Fascinating! I've had this idea that the EVP are of=
ten not recorded by the microphone but somehow make their way in at the act=
ual point where the storage is made, whether it be analog (tape) or digital=
. 

                                So much we don't know ...

            =
                    Zack

                                 
               =
                 On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 1:39 PM, April Abercrombie <april@a=
bercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:




                                I=
 monitor my audio live. The funny thing is that even so, those last EVP's I=
 captured I did not hear either in the environment, or on my recording as i=
t happened. I only heard them upon playback.

                             =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: Zack=
 Widup 
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
     =
                           Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 11:40 AM
           =
                     Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


                   =
             I am curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote sit=
e has ever gotten any EVP in real time.

                                I =
took part in an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Satur=
day night. We had six video cameras set up in the three halls of the buildi=
ng. The video for all was being monitored and recorded at a central locatio=
n. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera sites conected to the ce=
ntral location. I wonder what we might have heard if we did?

             =
                   Zack

                                 
                =
                On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <T=
hreadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:


                                Let's just=
 agree to end this discussion about her... 
                               =
 Why don't we discuss something on a lighter note? Anyone have any new idea=
s about either evp or ITC? 
                                Al

           =
                      

                                 

                =

                =
                <TR>
                                <TD vAlign=3Dtop>
    =
                            <DIV>I have a running theory that EVP is carrie=
d 
                                on an untrasonic wave and demodulated ex=
actly 
                                where they want it to manifest. It w=
orks off the 
                                heterodyne principle. If you =
mix two ultrasonic 
                                waves that differ one a=
nother in frequency then 
                                if you add or sub=
tract them together you get a 
                                beat frequen=
cy or alternate frequency. For 
                                example, if=
 a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz 
                                and =
you have an electric fan in a room creating 
                              =
  an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will 
                         =
       have a intermediate difference frequency at 
                  =
              9KHz, well within human hearing range (20Hz to 
             =
                   20KHz). This was just an example, but all 
             =
                   electronic equipment generates ultrasonic 
             =
                   signals just by turning them on. From this 
            =
                    theory I always felt that EVP were generated 
         =
                       within a few inches of the recorder.</DIV>
         =
                       <DIV> </DIV>
                                <D=
IV>We are able to reproduce this affect in not 
                           =
     only radio with superheterodyne systems but also 
                    =
            with acoustics and audio as in some passive 
                  =
              sonars and a commercial produce called the 
                 =
               "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</DIV>
             =
                   <DIV> </DIV>
                                <DIV>F=
rank R.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Mon, 6/8/09, Zack 
                               =
 Widup <I><w9sz.zack@gmail. com></I></B> 
                           =
     wrote:<BR></DIV>
                                <BLOCKQUOTE 
        =
                        style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid"><BR=
>From: 
                                Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. 
  =
                              com><BR>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New 
      =
                          ideas<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com<BR>Date: 
 =
                               Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM<BR><BR>
      =
                          <DIV id=3Dyiv100209972>
                         =
       <DIV id=3Dygrp-text>
                                <DIV>
         =
                       <DIV>Fascinating! I've had this idea that the 
     =
                           EVP are often not recorded by the 
        =
                        microphone but somehow make their way in at the 
  =
                              actual point where the storage is made, =

                                whether it be analog (tape) or 
          =
                      digital. <BR></DIV>
                            =
    <DIV>So much we don't know ...</DIV>
                                <D=
IV> </DIV>
                                <DIV>Zack</DIV>
           =
                     <DIV><BR> </DIV>

yriad Pro">I monitor my 
                                audio live. The fu=
nny thing is that even so,

                                either in the =
environment, or on my recording as 
                                it happ=
ened. I only heard them upon 
                                playback.</FO=

                      <DIV>
                                <DIV>
         =
                       <DIV>I am curious if anyone with a microphone 
     =
                           wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP 
=
                                in real time.</DIV>
                       =
         <DIV> </DIV>
                                <DIV>I took=
 part in an investigation 
                                of Ashmore =
Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday 
                                nigh=
t. We had six video cameras set up in the 
                                =
three halls of the building. The video for 
                               =
 all was being monitored and 
                                recorded=
 at a central location. Alas, we 
                                did =
not have microphones at the camera sites 
                                c=
onected to the central location. I wonder what 
                           =
     we might have heard if we did?</DIV>
                                <=
DIV> </DIV>
